metadata.description: Python/FastAPI 풀스택 개발을 위한 Claude Code 플러그인 마켓플레이스. package-managing, asgi-server, app-scaffolding, async-patterns, pydantic, agent-workflow, docker-build, test-runner 스킬을 포함합니다.

plugins.name: pdw-python-dev-tools
plugins.description: Python/FastAPI full-stack development plugin with 8 skills, 1 command (/scaffold-fastapi), and 1 agent (fastapi-reviewer)
